This site is a demonstration on making [Quarto][q] documents in a [JupyterLab][jl] environment. Websites are examined for easter egg content and the Quarto publishing system integrates with [GitHub Pages][ghp] to produce documents and websites in various formats.


[q]: https://quarto.org "Quarto | Home"
[jl]: https://jupyter.org "Jupyter Project | Home"
[ghp]: https://github.com "GitHub Pages | Home"
